name: TransportationInsecurityInterventionsSNOMEDCT
title: Transportation Insecurity Interventions SNOMED CT
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>

The terms in this value set represent the interventions associated with Transportation Insecurity as identified by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide as well as other uses of these SDOH terms.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT interventions that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes Social Determinants of Health General Interventions used in multiple domains.)
